name: 18 Hours NYC to New Zealand (WORLD’S LONGEST FLIGHTS)
description:
Watch this video to see what it’s like to travel on one of the world’s LONGEST FLIGHTS! This is Air New Zealand’s flagship route from New York to Auckland.

We made the trip from New York’s JFK international airport to Auckland’s International Airport onboard Air New Zealand Flight Number 1!

This video will showcase what it’s like to travel onboard the fourth longest flight on planet earth! We’ll highlight everything you’ll experience in Air New Zealand Business Class for almost 18 hours. 

You’ll see the Business Class Lounge used by Air New Zealand in New York, the quirky Air New Zealand Business Class seat, the scrumptious Air New Zealand Business Class food, the Inflight Entertainment, and even get a sense for Air New Zealand’s incredible onboard hospitality.

This Air New Zealand 787 Dreamliner flight was supposed to take about 17 hours, but thanks to a long taxi time at JFK Airport and “seasonable winds,” we were onboard for a whopping 18 hours and 10 minutes!

0:00 Introduction
1:02 Air New Zealand JFK Lounge
3:31 Boarding Air New Zealand’s Longest Flight
6:12 Dinner on Air New Zealand
7:20 Air New Zealand Business Class Bed
9:54 Breakfast on Air New Zealand
11:03 Air New Zealand JebScore
13:08 Bloopers
